title: The fence is down
description: This year, more than 165 journalists were assaulted in the United States. That’s more than the last two years combined. Only 10 of those assaults were not by law enforcement, and a staggering 88% came while journalists reported from protests related to the Trump administration’s immigration policies. The Trump administration also persists with its multifaceted...
